metadata.title: CVE-2022-2527 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in Incident Timelines has been discovered in GitLab CE/EEaffecting all versions starting from 14.9 before 15.1.6, all versionsstarting from 15.2 before 15.2.4, all versions starting from 15.3 before15.3.2.which allowed an authenticated attacker to inject arbitrary content.A victim interacting with this content could lead to arbitrary requests.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
